section.name: Uninstallation
section.p:
This page deals with uninstalling your community. Now to uninstall:
First go into your Tomcat Manager (Read "Installation" section if your having trouble getting into it).
Find your community context and click on "undeploy". This should delete the war file and the directory. *If it doesn't then shutdown tomcat and delete it war file and directory, then start tomcat back up.
Your community is uninstalled
